overview:
McGyver is Best described as a Business Development Entrepreneur.

As a creative talent rep he started a company in the first dotcom era called WORKFORCE CREATIVE. Unfortunately, he lost his financial butt in the meltdown, but Not before he created the original “Social Media” concept.

Originally, although unfortunately without the right term, his intent then and TODAY, is to address societal issues plaguing hoards of so called “creative” talent showing up on his doorstep. His objective is simply: To Get the Right talent in front of the Right project lead or employer without the performance dysfunctions conditioned through a fear driven education system. His concept Now entails ALL career/purpose categories.
